basics.name: Jim Beyers
basics.label: Engineering Leader
basics.summary: I spent many years in the hospitality industry which helped to shape my attitude to customer service.  This experience positions me to bridge the technical and business divide. I enjoy finding simple solutions to complex problems and enabling the business to make informed decisions to improve their processes.

work.summary: 'Engineering lead for Retail Bank API tranformation and shared platform team for Capital One Halo'
highlights: Manage application/software development to deliver technology prototypes in support of business assessment.
Manage a broad portfolio of diverse technology projects to provide web, mobile, and integration solutions.
Recruit, motivate, mentor, and lead the best application engineering talent.

Manage technology support teams to develop business applications, or ensure business applications have high availability and adequate performance, to include demonstrating year-over-year performance improvement.

Engineering Director for 'Guest Fulfillment Engineering' ,'Availability', 'Flexible Fulfillment',  'Available to Promise', 'Find it in a Target Store', 'Add to Cart', 'Order By Get By', 'Buy online pickup in Store', 'Ship to Store' and other related products.
Provided availability information for Target Marketplaces
Transactional availability to show real-time and scaled nearly-real-time availability for all digital channels
de-facto product team - considered the example of how product works with engineering in multiple geographies

work.summary: Engineering Manager for the Availability platform for Target.com
highlights: Consolidated to a single source of availability for Target.com
Provided "Order By Get By" to drive conversion on Target.com
Consolidated Flexible fulfillment processes to offer as a platform for Target digital channels

work.summary: Provided technology direction, ensured project implementation compliance, and utilized technology research to innovate, integrate, and manage technology solutions. Contributed to identifying best-fit architectural solutions for multiple projects. Participate in pre-sales and delivery. As a leader of the business unit, mentored other consultants to provide coaching for their careers and delivery.

awards.title: Honesty and Integrity Award
awards.summary: Award description : Honesty and Integrity – Be forthright and ethical in all interactions with clients and colleagues, demonstrated consistently through our behavior in every situation, every day.

publications.name: Target’s First Foray into an In-Memory Data Grid
publications.summary: 2015 saw the birth of a new product team at Target, Available to Promise (ATP) ATP is a new way to talk to guests about product availability and delivery times on target.com and is used as the the reservation engine for orders. In order to provide the guest experience that we are seeking to deliver on Target.com – the team chose to make use of an in memory data grid to serve up these features. This talk will cover what the team did right, what they did wrong, and what they were able to achieve (metrics).

publications.name: Spring Boot
publications.summary: Internal "Geek Talk" at Target about spring boot, cassandra, and hazelcast

publications.name: Camel in Criminal Justice
publications.summary: Talked about how we implemented camel to displace IBM MQ and Broker
